website_summaries.verdict: A flaxseed supplement designed to provide your daily requirements in 1 pill.
pros: Filled with 1,400 mg Liquid soft gels
Designed to provide a daily dose in 1 pill
Appears to help with dry eyes and digestion
cons: The pills are a little large to swallow easily
Pork-based products in this pill make it unsuitable for vegetarians

customer_reviews.title: Helped my eyes just like my eye doctor said it might!
customer_reviews.text: My eye doctor recommended that I start taking Flaxseed Oil because I work on a computer all day everyday and was using eye drops multiple times a day. I didn't really think about it much until one day when my boyfriend asked me if I had some eye drops he could use - I said of course I have tons of eye drops..... 3 unopened boxes actually because I have been able to stop using them!
customer_reviews.author: 🙈🙉🙊

customer_reviews.title: Statin Free
customer_reviews.text: Flaxseed oil is great for cleaning out the bad cholesterol. I've been taking this brand for years. The doctor told me 4 years ago that I needed to take the prescription statin. I chose to take flaxseed oil instead. I take over the normal dose which is 6 a day two with each meal. When I take physical exams with my doctor, my numbers are always down. It works!!
customer_reviews.author: Veela

customer_reviews.title: These are nice usually I don't find the 1400 mg and they're ...
customer_reviews.text: These are nice usually I don't find the 1400 mg and they're clear they're a little bit bigger than the ones that I normally have but I mean they're soft so they go right down I don't have any issues getting them down
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great flaxseed oil
customer_reviews.text: I buy this Nature Made flaxseed oil instead of fish oil. I have had terrible luck with the burping of fish oil. This is a wonderful alternative. However, these gel tablets are pretty large-if you are one to have issues.
customer_reviews.author: pegatha

customer_reviews.title: Huge Pills
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item a few months ago. I must say that these pills are incredibly large!! In fact they are the largest pills I've ever seen. I don't recommend this item. I have seen and used smaller much more reasonably sized pills.
customer_reviews.author: Happydog

customer_reviews.title: Works great ...
customer_reviews.text: Menopause ... flaxseed oil works for me. After about a week, hot flashes lessen... mood swings gone... When i run out I notice the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise they are a good source of Omega 3
customer_reviews.text: These capsules are huge, so if you have a hard time swallowing pills, these are not the supplement for you. Otherwise they are a good source of Omega 3,6 and 9 fatty acids. I take for cholesterol control and have noticed a difference in my levels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Miracle cure for thinning/balding hair
customer_reviews.text: I struggled with losing my hair and it thinning out. This has changed my life. If you’re deficient, this is the answer! My hair has grown several inches since I started using and I have new growth in areas that were previously balding.
customer_reviews.author: Kamerica35

customer_reviews.title: Did not absorb in system to be useful
customer_reviews.text: My body does not like flaxseed in this form! Was taking in the AM and in evening I had what I believe to be a 'heartburn' of sorts. Took me awhile to identify due to the time-lapse but once I stopped taking the flaxseed oil, the symptoms stopped. May try again another time, but for now, this was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: MTEK

customer_reviews.title: A fix for dry eyes
customer_reviews.text: Although there are many cardiovascular benefits to flaxseed I started taking them for my eyes. Working on computers 8 hours or more a day my eyes tend to dry out. Eye drops did little to help and the prescription drops were a bit pricey. A friend of my recommended flaxseed based on a suggestion from her doctor. They work! I’m a person who doesn’t like taking meds so one pill a day is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Good size, good price
customer_reviews.text: Good price, but I really don't appreciate it being an add on item. I have a prime membership but I still had to purchase $25 worth of products to purchase. I have purchased this same product in a big box store, and it was a better deal, but when things are on sale, I like to stock up, and it came in such a big bottle, the last one I opened was in one big clump. So this is a much better size, and it's a VERY good product. Great for inflammation without containing any animal products!
customer_reviews.author: Katlover

customer_reviews.title: I bought two jars
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful and amazing. I brought two jars one for me and the other for my grown up daughter. Our edges are getting thin and damaged, but taking these pills we both have seen a tremendous improvement. I will be buying more of these pills from this company. Worth every dime.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Louise Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry eyes👁
customer_reviews.text: Here’s the best advice I was ever given...., if u have dry eyes? Take 2 a day.....it’s effects are a miracle. Nothing less. Try it.
customer_reviews.author: Melusina

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Trying it for hair growth ill up date with results well so far so good i see the length but no thickening
customer_reviews.author: Debra scott

customer_reviews.title: Flaxseed Oil at its best!
customer_reviews.text: My hubby insists that this is a necessary part of his vitamin regimen. He has tried other brands, but always comes back to this one. He says it works the best.
customer_reviews.author: Ranged Healer

customer_reviews.title: Helps Joints & Stiffness
customer_reviews.text: I work out a lot & run. I was looking for something to help w/ my joints. Been taking for a couple of months. I do feel a lot better. I feel less stiff and I have noticed less cracking. And, I was able to get back to running outside : )
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great for hair and skin
customer_reviews.text: Great for hair and skin! Gives gentle and natural moisture by ingestion, that you just can’t get with lotion. Also helps digestion
customer_reviews.author: Jillian brunty

customer_reviews.title: Take at Night and Helps Ease Stiffness
customer_reviews.text: Flaxseed helps with joint inflammation and these oil capsules are easy to swallow and absorb overnight for comfortable rest.
customer_reviews.author: TinaChristina

customer_reviews.title: item
customer_reviews.text: i brought this before from a pharmacy and my father says it works for him. he loves it. he wanted more, so i order it from amazon due to timing to get to him before his stock runs out. came on time and now how he has less pain and can move easy .
customer_reviews.author: Dori bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Easy to swallow
customer_reviews.text: These are huge but to be excepted with benign flaxseed oil. The easiest way to get in my system. I have joint issues and have had skin cancer so I feel good knowing that this vitamin can be a help with those issues plus heart health!
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Time to test gag reflex
customer_reviews.text: No vitamin tastes good lol This horse-pill isn’t for the skinny esophagus people or anyone intimidated by swallowing a football in pill form...but at least you only need one a day thank the Lord. The company itself has a great resumé and their product has always been top. No concerns there.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Better than fish oil
customer_reviews.text: I switched from fish oil to this and for my body this is much better, none of the nastiness that comes with the fish oil.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I use Flaxseed oil caps all the time. I don't believe I've ever received them all misshapen. Yes, they are a gel, subject to heat, I suppose, but once I opened the sealed bottle, their condition surprised me. I see no other difference
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Huge Caps
customer_reviews.text: These capsules are huge and hard. If you have trouble swallowing pills, these may be too big. I didn’t want to take the risk so I bite them and they break at the seams. The oil doesn’t taste like much of anything so that is how I take them.
customer_reviews.author: Roseredstudio

customer_reviews.title: Good product but extremely hard to swallow..... I have 340 in house!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for people who need the benefits, however someone needs to make them smaller, my husband gags every time he tried to swallow one, I'm on a QUEST TO FIND A SMALL FLAXSEED OIL SOFTGEL,,,, PLEASE HELP ME IF YOU HAVE FOUND ANY SMALLER THAN A QUARTER!?!? THANKS
customer_reviews.author: SHARI SHOPPER

customer_reviews.title: No good for us
customer_reviews.text: My wife started getting nose bleeds from using it I have two unopened bottles what to do? Product returned and refunded her nose bleeds stopped.She will need to go to the doctor and see if underlying conditions exist or if there's an actual issue.I would appreciate feedback from the manufacturer to find out if any issues like this hee been reported before .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you care about your health, get this!
customer_reviews.text: Top 3 best herbs out there for your health! This product has helped clearing our my acne, and every sense I started taking it I have felt more energized (especially in the mornings)
customer_reviews.author: Kayden D.

customer_reviews.title: Affordable good Product!
customer_reviews.text: Does it's job with the value of money you put in. There wasn’t much of a smell with the pills and it wasn’t hard to swallow them. Can’t say it is the best Flaxseed oil product in the market but you can get what you paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love flax seed! Look up the benefits :) you’re welcome
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for dry eyes. After two days, yes, I noticed a big improvement so will now never go without flaxseed oil.
customer_reviews.author: Checkmate

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I really like this brand of flaxseed. It is easy to swallow, flavorless and a good value for the money. Flaxseed helps keep my lipids dow and I feel it helps keep my weight normal
customer_reviews.author: donna yates

customer_reviews.title: Flax Soft Pills
customer_reviews.text: I just needed to buy more supply and this appeared to be the cheapest. Soft gels are easy to swallow and really have no taste which is fine rather than having a bad taste. Really nothing to add beyond that.

customer_reviews.text: The flaxseed oil by nature made was rancid when I received it.

customer_reviews.text: Used flax seed before, but these are so darn big. Which makes them hard to swollow. There's no taste they're flavorless.

customer_reviews.text: I will somehow finish this bottle but the pills are the biggest I have ever taken, will not buy again ever.

customer_reviews.title: Me and my baby.

Couldn't find more in the store, but happily found it at Nature Made online. Getting 3 bottles, because I like buying in bulk.

customer_reviews.title: Great!

customer_reviews.text: Very strong, unpleasant smell when bottle opened. Well within expiration date. There is no taste from capsule. Have used this brand for years. Was advised they were safe to take despite smell.

customer_reviews.title: They were all stuck together in the bottle when they arrived.

But, when I received them they were all stuck together inside the bottle. (They were never like this in the store) I shook some apart, but the rest I tried to gently pull apart but some of them leaked, so I ended up throwing most of them away. Was disappointed at the money lost.

customer_reviews.title: Be careful not to order automatic deliveries!

However, somehow I signed up for automatic deliveries and it is coming today-- a long time before I need it. I cannot easily find out how to stop the automatic deliveries, thus this review. Please stop the automatic deliveries!

product_meta.title: Nature Made Flaxseed Oil 1400 mg Softgels, 100 Count for Heart Health† (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description: Size:100 Count (Pack of 1)Trust your heart health with Nature Made Flaxseed Oil 1,400 mg softgels, a plant-based source of essential fatty acids including the omega-3 alpha linolenic acid (ALA).† Consumption of omega-3 fatty acids helps support a healthy heart.†
feature_bullets: For a limited time, you may receive either bottle while we update our packaging. Both have the same great product inside. Based on new FDA regulations, you may also notice a change in the unit of measure and/or daily value for certain products.
Contains a 100-day supply of Nature Made Flaxseed Oil 1400 mg Softgels, 100 softgels per bottle.
Consumption of omega-3 fatty acids helps support a healthy heart.
Adults, take 1 softgel daily with water and a meal.
These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
